content.name: CSS Wars
content.description: Predominantly painters are the ones who can draw. Let's change it into programmers for the day. Calling out to design artists to showcase their art through CSS.
rules: This is an individual participation event.
In the 1st round, an on-the-spot CSS designing task will be given.
Qualification to Round 2 is based on the Jury's decision.
In round 2, qualified participants have to replicate a given web page’s graphics within the given time limit.
Participants should code only using NotePad.
Participants are prohibited from using the Internet.
Judge’s decision is final and up for no dispute.
